name: soulsync
description: SoulSync is an automated music discovery and collection manager that syncs playlists from Spotify, Tidal, or YouTube to your local library and media servers via Soulseek and slskd.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatically downloads music from Spotify, Tidal, or YouTube playlists

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Searches and downloads tracks via Soulseek P2P network

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Adds proper ID3 tags to downloaded music files

features.title: Library Organization
features.description: Organizes files by artist, album, and track structure

features.title: Media Server Sync
features.description: Updates Plex, Jellyfin, or other servers after downloads
